thread.title: Sanders planning 'major speech' on democratic socialism
thread.title_full: Sanders planning 'major speech' on democratic socialism - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Sanders planning 'major speech' on democratic socialism
text: [...] aides say he welcomes the opportunity to address the issue after Democratic rival Hillary Rodham Clinton brought it up at the debate in Las Vegas last week. Sanders often speaks about the expansive social programs of some European democracies as a model for the U.S. In the debate, he talked about Denmark. > ...
